thread.title_full: Keepin' It Reel : Keepin' It Reel, Episode 303: Is Marvel Entertainment at War With Itself?

author: IGN.com (podcasts@ign.com)
title: Keepin' It Reel : Keepin' It Reel, Episode 303: Is Marvel Entertainment at War With Itself?
text:
Keepin' It Reel, Episode 303: Is Marvel Entertainment at War With Itself? 
Welcome back to Keepin' It Reel! In this week's episode of IGN's movies podcast, Jim Vejvoda and Eric Goldman bring you some of the latest in genre movie news. (Alas, The Curse of the Podcast struck again and we recorded this episode before the X-Men TV news and confirmation of Hulk being in Thor: Ragnarok dropped.) 
This week's topics include: Reports of bad blood between Marvel Studios and Marvel TV, including rumors about the Inhumans movie and Iron Fist Netflix series; the failure of Pan and what it might mean for other upcoming public domain screen adaptations of Tarzan and Robin Hood; Lucafilm's dedication to diversifying their Star Wars directors; plus, the latest on Godzilla vs. King Kong, Alien: Paradise Lost, Mad Max: Wasteland, Expendables 4, and more. 
We also share our thoughts on this week's new releases: Crimson Peak, Goosebumps, and Bridge of Spies.
